markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 34 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29 [Onyiji](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1680) **Source** [Pathfinder #171: Hurricane's Howl](/Sources.aspx?ID=101) pg. 9 **Perception** +15; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +14, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +16, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +18, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +16, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +14, [Warfare Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +16 **Str** +4 **Dex** +2 **Con** +2 **Int** +4 **Wis** +2 **Cha** +0 **Items** _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)_ --- **AC** 26 **Fort** +18 **Ref** +14 **Will** +16 **HP** 140 **[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)**
**Orc Superstition** ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) **Trigger** Onyiji is about to make a saving throw against a spell or magical effect; **Effect** Onyiji gains a +1 circumstance bonus to the triggering save. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _staff_ +20 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [two-handed d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)), **Damage** 2d6+8 bludgeoning **Arcane Prepared Spells** DC 26, attack +18 - **Cantrips (4th)** [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236), [Ray of Frost](/Spells.aspx?ID=245), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280) - **2nd** [Shocking Grasp](/Spells.aspx?ID=283), [True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345) **Spellstrike** **Frequency** twice per day; **Effect** Onyiji casts a spell and couples it with a staff Strike. She casts [_produce flame_](/Spells.aspx?ID=236), [_ray of frost_](/Spells.aspx?ID=245), or [_shocking grasp_](/Spells.aspx?ID=283), but the effects don't occur immediately. She makes a melee Strike with her staff and uses the attack roll result as the effect of both the Strike and the spell. This counts as two attacks towards her multiple attack penalty, but the penalties don't apply until after the Spellstrike. **Twisting Tree** When Onyiji wields a [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12) in one hand, it gains the [agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170) trait and its damage die size increases to d6 (these adjustments are reflected in the Strike above). When she wields a staff in two hands, it gains the [parry](/Traits.aspx?ID=190), [reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), and [trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196) traits. She can Interact to Release or change her grip on her staff as a free action when she Strikes with the staff (including Strikes made in a Spellstrike).
name: Onyiji

spell_markdown: [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236), [Ray of Frost](/Spells.aspx?ID=245), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Shocking Grasp](/Spells.aspx?ID=283), [True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345)
text: Onyiji Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 34 Unspecific Lore : DC 32 Specific Lore : DC 29 Onyiji Source Pathfinder #171: Hurricane's Howl pg. 9 Perception +15; darkvision Languages Common Skills Acrobatics +14, Arcana +16, Athletics +18, Intimidation +16, Nature +14, Warfare Lore +16 Str +4 Dex +2 Con +2 Int +4 Wis +2 Cha +0 Items +1 striking staff --- AC 26 Fort +18 Ref +14 Will +16 HP 140 Attack of Opportunity Reaction Orc Superstition Reaction (concentrate) Trigger Onyiji is about to make a saving throw against a spell or magical effect; Effect Onyiji gains a +1 circumstance bonus to the triggering save. --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action staff +20 (Agile, two-handed d8), Damage 2d6+8 bludgeoning Arcane Prepared Spells DC 26, attack +18 - Cantrips (4th) Detect Magic, Produce Flame, Ray of Frost, Shield - 2nd Shocking Grasp, True Strike Spellstrike Two Actions Frequency twice per day; Effect Onyiji casts a spell and couples it with a staff Strike. She casts produce flame , ray of frost , or shocking grasp , but the effects don't occur immediately. She makes a melee Strike with her staff and uses the attack roll result as the effect of both the Strike and the spell. This counts as two attacks towards her multiple attack penalty, but the penalties don't apply until after the Spellstrike. Twisting Tree When Onyiji wields a staff in one hand, it gains the agile trait and its damage die size increases to d6 (these adjustments are reflected in the Strike above). When she wields a staff in two hands, it gains the parry, reach, and trip traits. She can Interact to Release or change her grip on her staff as a free action when she Strikes with the staff (including Strikes made in a Spellstrike).
